_reserved.description: Padding to make sure targets is an array

layer_argument_fifo.description: Layer arguments FIFO: each layer is defined by writing 12 successive argument values to this register

interrupt_mask.description: Interrupt mask: 0 enables the interrupt, 1 masks the interrupt

interrupt_clear.description: Interrupt clear: write 1 to a bit to clear interrupt

blk_tfr.description: Channel Block Transfer Resume Request Register

_reserved.description: Padding to make structure size 256 bytes so that channels[] is an array

txoicr.description: Transmit FIFO Overflow Interrupt Clear Register

rxoicr.description: Receive FIFO Overflow Interrupt Clear Register

rxuicr.description: Receive FIFO Underflow Interrupt Clear Register

xrxoicr.description: XIP Receive FIFO Overflow Interrupt Clear Register

xip_cnt_time_out.description: XIP time out register for continuous transfers

left_rxtx.description: Left Receive or Left Transmit Register

right_rxtx.description: Right Receive or Right Transmit Register

dir_bidx[%s].description: Direction Sample Buffer Read Index Configure Register (16 directions * 2 values * 4 indices)

sobuf_dma_rdata.description: Read register for DMA to sample-out buffers

vobuf_dma_rdata.description: Read register for DMA to voice-out buffers

ss_scl_hcnt.description: Standard Speed Clock SCL High Count Register

ss_scl_lcnt.description: Standard Speed Clock SCL Low Count Register

clr_intr.description: Clear Combined and Individual Interrupt Register

fs_spklen.description: SS, FS or FM+ spike suppression limit

tie_en[%s].description: FPIOA GPIO multiplexer tie enable array

tie_val[%s].description: FPIOA GPIO multiplexer tie value array

data_in.description: SHA256 input data is written to this register

dummy.description: Dummy register: this peripheral is not implemented yet
